intro1.message: This is an experimental procedure to import a profile. There is no dataloss risk, but it's not guaranteed that everything will work as expected, especially if you're importing a profile from another computer. It's anyway safer than copying the files manually.

intro2.message: The folder contains a valid profile that can be imported. During the procedure, that could take several minutes or even more, you can't use the program.

intro3.message: To access the imported profile, run the profile manager clicking on the button below. The current profile will be automatically closed

isEudora.message: Aquest fitxer "mbox" sembla que prové del programa Eudora.\nEl Thunderbird no pot gestionar-lo i heu de convertir-lo a un format "mbox" estàndard.

isNotStandard.message: This "mbox" file uses a different format from the Thunderbird folder format\nand it's possible that Thunderbird can't handle it properly.\nDo you want to continue?
